titleStmt.title: Herman Hadlan v. D.M Brown. Writ

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Herman Hadlan v. D.M. Brown. Writ
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: In the District Court holding terms at Olympia for Mason and Thurston Counties
In the matter of Herman Hadlan for a Writ of Habeas Corpus

Upon reading and filing the petition of Herman Hadlan, duly signed and verified by him, whereby it appears that he is illegally imprisoned and restrained of his liberty by D.M. Brown, Marshall of the City of Olympia County of Thurston, Territory of Washington, and stating wherein the alleged illegality consists: from which it appears to me that a Writ of Habeas Corpus ought to issue. It is ordered that a writ of Habeas Corpus issue out of and under the seal of the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory holding terms at Olympia, directed to the said D.M. Brown, Marshall as aforesaid, commanding him to have the body of the said Herman Hadlan before me in the Court room of said Court at the City of Olympia County of Thurston Territory of Washington on the second day of July AD 1884 at the hour of three o'clock P.M. of said day; to do and receive what shall then and there by considered concerning the said petitioner Herman Hadlan; together with the time and cause of his detention, and that you have then and there the said Writ.
Dated July 2 1884 John P. Hoyt Judge of said Court
Territory of Washington County of Thurston } ss
I R.S. O'Bruin Clerk of said Court hereby certify the foregoing to be a true copy of the order in said matter made and entered now of in my office.
Witness my hand and the seal of said Court this July 2 1884 R.S. O'Bruin Clerk
Territory of Washington County of Thurston } ss

WIlliam Billings Sheriff of Thurston County W.T. hereby certify that the within writ comes into my hands on the 2nd day of July 1884 and that upon the same, at the hour of 11 45 A.M. of that say issued the same upon the within named D.M. Brown Marshall of the City of Olympia at said Olympia in Thurston County W.T. by to and with said Brown a true and correct copy of said writ duly cer- tified by me to be such true copy July 2/84
William Billings Sheriff of Thurston County WT By R.P. Shocroft Deputy
